items.content: Joe prefers LOCAL tier for simple tasks (free), Haiku for medium complexity, Sonnet for code/routine analysis, Opus for complex reasoning only. Cost-conscious with $25 prepaid credits.
Web search efficiency pattern: Brave Search API → web_fetch (extract content) → browser only for interaction/JS. Replaces blind browser automation.
Joe interested in memory architecture, efficiency optimization, LOCAL sub-agent patterns, and building intelligent systems. Prototyping Memory Curator system for conversation continuity.
Git commit author: Joe Ho (joesubsho@gmail.com). Alfred-Dashboard repo uses hopenclaw@gmail.com for Vercel deployments.
Joe proactive hours: 8:30am - 11pm AST. Quiet after 11pm unless urgent. Location: Dieppe, New Brunswick, Canada (Atlantic timezone).
